changeSet.author: doncoffee
changeSet.sql: create table `confectionery-store`.store ( store_id int auto_increment primary key, address_id int null, phone_number_id int null, constraint FKaiuyyh4m9r3w97ah6d3gqhb20 foreign key (phone_number_id) references `confectionery-store`.phone_number (phone_number_id), constraint FKp2sen6ouwnlht537csk0kip90 foreign key (address_id) references `confectionery-store`.address (address_id) );
